metadata.synopsis: The phasm has left the player's inventory once it arrives in Lower City.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Go to CTY_Main_A2. The AD will play almost immediately on entering the city, since this is when the phasm leaves the player's inventory atm.

0.speaker: Strange Apple
0.text: Oh-ho! Thank you for the lift, my friend. Thank you very much indeed. Ta-ta!
